Translations.Text: Alipha-la-ma-ra; egulo paripurna grantha o suspasta kora'anera ayata.
Kona samaya kapherara akanksa karabe ye, ki camatkara hata, yadi tara musalamana hata.
Apani chere dina taderake, kheye nika ebam bhoga kare nika ebam asaya byaprta thakuka. Ati satbara tara jene nebe.
Ami kona janapada dhabansa karini; kinta tara nirdista samaya likhita chila.
Kona sampradaya tara nirdista samayera agre yaya na ebam pascate thake na.
Tara balalah he ai byakti, yara prati kora'ana nayila hayeche, apani to ekajana um'mada.
Yadi apani satyabadi hana, tabe amadera kache pheresataderake anena na kena
ami pheresataderake ekamatra phayasalara jan'ye'i nayila kari. Takhana taderake abakasa deya habe na.
Ami sbayam e upadesa grantha abatarana karechi ebam ami nije'i era sanraksaka.
Ami apanara purbe purbabarti sampradayera madhye rasula prerana karechi.
Odera kache emana kona rasula asenani, yadera sathe ora thattabidrupa karate thakeni.
Emanibhabe ami e dharanera acarana papidera antare bad'dhamula kare de'i.
Ora era prati bisbasa karabe na. Purbabartidera emana riti cale asache.
Yadi ami odera samane akasera kona daraja'o khule de'i ara tate ora dinabhara arohana o karate thake.
Tabu'o ora ekatha'i balabe ye, amadera drstira bibhrata ghatano hayeche na baram amara yadugrasta haye parechi.
